columns.name: stream_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the stream.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: The ID of the AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) key that Kinesis Video Streams uses to encrypt data on the stream.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: A time stamp that indicates when the stream was created.

columns.name: data_retention_in_hours
columns.description: How long the stream retains data, in hours.

columns.name: device_name
columns.description: The name of the device that is associated with the stream.
